synopsis.text: Yura's and Makoto's marital bliss unfolds in a fresh, three-volume anime series from the Futari Ecchi franchise, marking its first new release in over a decade. The narrative centers around the couple's first Christmas celebration post-marriage and their initial intimate encounter. This heartwarming tale is encapsulated in the first episode, aptly titled 'Futari no First Christmas' (Our First Christmas). The series is available in standard DVD format and as part of a deluxe DVD collection featuring all seven OVAs of the series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
